name: JankyHorrorFriday
description:
Each playthrough generates a new map with a shitty random generator. Possible to have a very short playthrough with no difficulties..or a little more challenging one.

Perfectly curated to contain possible jank.

Have you ever played a game and thought "A door? Why do I need a key if I have an axe?" 

Then this is the right game for you!

Take up your axe and destroy doors with it! Collect keys (just collect them.. even if there is no reason to) and use them to open doors instead? Keys are great.

Reach the final open air room for a reward.
